column4: Doesn't the license specify your selling your support of it and not the software its self?
Still need to know if you can wire a wifi antenna backwards.

GPL allows you to seel it, but anyone you sell it to is allowed to pass it on for free. and the source code may be made available by the person selling it as well. i think that's right but don't hold me to it 100%
i mean 'the source code must* be made available...'
